'''Hui''' is an [[NPC]] in [[Liyue]], near the [[Statue of The Seven]] at [[Dihua Marsh]], [[Bishui Plain]]. He can be found on top of the rock near [[Hulu]]'s stall.

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Hui.png|Hui's location
NPC Location Hui Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Hui is a backstabber who claims to be from out of town.

===Personality===
Hui is timid when it comes to dogs, and fails to recognize that [[Strong]] loves him.

===Appearance===
Hui is an adult man of average height and build with black hair and blue eyes. His hair is short and slicked to the right side of his face. He wears an outfit with an assortment of grey, black, brown, and white accents.

:'''Hui:''' My hero has come at last! Save me! Chase this dog away!

:{{DIcon}} ...This dog clearly loves you.
::'''Hui:''' Loves me!? He's trying to chase me down and kill me! Look, he bit my trouser leg...
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Hui:''' Don't go! Oh no, save me, ahhh...
{{dialogue end}}
